Module com.example._50zo
Package com.example._50zo.model

Class Game50

java.lang.Object
com.example._50zo.model.Game50
public class Game50 extends Object
Represents the main logic of the "Game50" card game.

This class manages the interaction between the player, the deck, and the table. It enforces the gameâ€™s main rule: the total sum of played cards on the table must not exceed 50. It also handles card drawing, deck refilling, and player elimination.

    • canPlayCard

      public boolean canPlayCard(Card card)
      Checks if a given card can be legally played according to the rules.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to test
      Returns:
      true if playing the card does not exceed 50, false otherwise

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(Player player, Card card) throws InvalidMoveException
      Allows a player to play a card during the game.

      The method checks whether adding the selected card's value to the current table total would exceed 50. If it does, the move is invalid and no changes are made. Otherwise, the card is added to the table, removed from the player's hand, and the player draws a new card from the deck if available.

      If the deck is empty, it is refilled with cards from the table (except the last one), and the player then draws a new card if possible.

      Parameters:
      player - the player who is playing the card
      card - the card the player chooses to play
      Returns:
      true if the card was played successfully; false if the move was invalid
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException

    • getTableTotal

      public int getTableTotal()
      Returns the total value currently on the table.
      Returns:
      the sum of the values of all cards currently on the table

    • hasPlayableCard

      public boolean hasPlayableCard(Player player)
      Determines if a player has any playable card left. Used to check if a player should be eliminated.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose cards are being checked
      Returns:
      true if the player has at least one playable card; false otherwise
